title: PS3 SAINTS ROW IV: DLC PACK V5 ALL DLC UNLOCKER reup
description:
by FUGAZI

The iMARS release is the BLUS version

Commander-In-Chief Pack
- Blast through the skies with the Screaming Eagle jet.
- New weapon: 'Merica Gun
- Dress as the embodiment of the American Dream himself - Uncle Sam costume.


Volition Comics Pack
- extra comic-themed outfits.
- Dress up as THE IRON ROGUE in grim metal visage costume.
- Put on the legendary chestplate of the warrior woman QUEEN AMAZONIA costume.


Wild West Pack
- The pack includes a fitting cowboy outfit and a wild west dress.
- 2 new Weapons: Wild West themed shotgun and revolver.


GAT V Pack
- Receive GAT-olicious themed outfits and GAT style hair.
- 2 new weapons: combat knife launcher, 50. caliber rifle


The Presidential Pack
- Wear the masks of two of US most highly-regarded founding fathers or as the two Heads of State who heralded in the new millennium.
- Includes two new outfits.
- A wig befitting someone whose face is on US money.


Grass Roots Pack
- This is a culturally-sensitive pack inspired by America's more remote citizenry.
- Includes two new outfits.
- A new weapon
- Vehicle: A fancy truck


The Executive Privilege Pack
- This pack does away with checks and balances and gives you the power to make the world of Saints Row IV your own.
- Cheat your way to a hollow victory today! Money, money, money!
- Note: This pack doesnt force you with unlimited money. You get additional option in menu to unlock this dlc.


The Rectifier Gun
- An exclusive weapon, the "Rectifier". Yes, it's an anal probe.
- Walk to enemy, spin them around and shove it up their ass.
- Option unlocked for Recto-Rockets to upgrade Rectifier.
- If you cant take this wicked shit, lol, dont use it.


Dubstep Gun (Remix) Pack
- Take a bullet-laden trip through musical history with music gun!
- Get the crowd off its feet with the power of polka, set those hepcats a-swinging with big band, indulge your refined side with some classical, and then start the mosh pit with some heavy metal.


Online Pass
- For online multiplayer and/or co-op playing.
